DOC.brief_summary: Sarcopenia related mobility dysfunction was a preventable presentation in transitional variation of frailty. However, the definition, associated risk factors, clinical course and outcome of sarcopenia in Taiwanese older adults are still under-clarified and need for further study.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation, Biomarkers and Metabolomics of Sarcopenia in Frail Older Adults at Ambulatory Clinics
